songs.title: Why You Mad?/Flask*
songs.lyrics:
Lyrics From Snippet

[Intro]
Oh, life is short!
Ayy, pew-pew, rockstar
Where is my flask? (pew-pew-pew)
Gimmie one!
Yeah, VR-ALLSTARS!
Sauce, ayy, diamonds wet
Ayy!

[Verse]
Got my mask! (Got my what?)
Got my flask! (Got my vool!)
Ooh, why you mad? (why you-?)

[Chorus]
Pull up for a bag! (why you, why you?)
Get them running, yo
On a dash, ayy!
Why you mad?
We keep running like the flash, yuh!

[Bridge]
Why you mad? why you mad?
Why you mad? why you mad?

[Chorus]
Pull up for a bag!
Get them running, ayy!
On a dash, ayy!
Why you mad, uh?
We keep tryna slash, yuh!
Bitch, ayy!
